summary: This document is a Second Home Rider that amends and supplements a mortgage agreement between the Borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company. It outlines the terms under which the Borrower must occupy the property located at 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC, as a second home and includes stipulations regarding the provision of accurate information during the loan application process.

persons.name: Fifth Third Mortgage Company
persons.context: Fifth Third Mortgage Company is identified as the lender in the mortgage agreement.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The document is a Second Home Rider dated December 10, 2014.
It amends the original mortgage agreement between the Borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company.
The Borrower is required to occupy the property as a second home and cannot enter into shared ownership or rental agreements.
The Borrower must provide accurate information during the loan application process, or they will be in default.
